net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dndb_convertWeapons
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip: This is a function that requires the DND Beyond Character full JSON. It's not intended to run stand-alone. Returns a simplifed json object of the weapons. Optional boolean flag may be passed to direct if all or only equipped weapons are provided. Default behavior returns only equipped weapons.
